name: Pink Mango
description: Pink Mango, a 60% sativa-dominant hybrid, is a cross between Blackberry, Blueberry, and Grapefruit. The dense buds are indica in structure with a rosy hue, offering fruity flavors of mango and berry with earthy undertones. The uplifting effects are a balanced combination of euphoria, relaxation, and physical arousal, useful for alleviating depression, pain, and nausea.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Sleepy, Aroused, Euphoric, Stress, Depression, Pain, Headaches, Lack of Appetite, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth
